page.title: 15 AN EVENING AT CUBS
page.content: Our{Cub Pack}meets at 6.30 p.m. in our school hall. When we first go in we have a{grand howl. The pack (allthe {cubs)}squats in the circle. A{sixer jumps up and shouts, "Cubs, do your best." The rest of the cubs jump up and shout, "we will do our best." Then{Akela}collects our subscripton which is 20p.We then have inspection. We have to bring five things; a pen, a piece of paper, a 10 pence piece, string and a handkerchief. After that we go out and play{games}like{football or{rounders. Then}We come in and sit in a circle to sing some{scout {songs.}After this we read a chapter from the{Jungle Book,}followed by more games. We have prayers, any notices and then we are dismissed at 8.00 p.m.
